# https://www.firecrawl.dev llms.txt

- [Web Data Scraping](https://www.firecrawl.dev/): Transform web data into AI-ready structured content.
- [Web Data Extraction Playground](https://www.firecrawl.dev/playground): All-in-one platform for web data extraction and scraping.
- [Open Agent Builder Tool](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/open-agent-builder): Open-source visual tool to build AI agent workflows easily.
- [Medical AI Application](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/building_medical_ai_application_with_grok_4): Create a medical AI app with Grok 4 for prescriptions.
- [AI Engineering Resources](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/category/ai-engineering): Explore AI engineering with tutorials, tools, and insights.
- [AI Chat Support](https://www.firecrawl.dev/use-cases/ai-chats): Effortlessly power AI chats with real-time web data extraction.
- [Best Web Extraction Tool](https://www.firecrawl.dev/glossary/web-extraction-apis/best-tool-extracting-content-redesigning-pages): AI-powered tool streamlining web content extraction effortlessly.
- [Firecrawl Sign In](https://www.firecrawl.dev/signin): User login and account creation for Firecrawl services.
- [Instant Chatbot Creation](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/firestarter-rag-chatbot-generator): Build AI chatbots from any website in seconds.
- [CSS Selectors in Scraping](https://www.firecrawl.dev/glossary/web-extraction-apis/what-is-css-selector-web-scraping): Learn about CSS selectors for web scraping efficiency.
- [Enterprise Data Solutions](https://www.firecrawl.dev/enterprise): Enterprise solutions for reliable web data extraction and security.
- [Proxy in Web Scraping](https://www.firecrawl.dev/glossary/web-scraping-apis/what-is-proxy-web-scraping): Proxy servers in web scraping manage requests and IP distribution.
- [Web Integration Solutions](https://www.firecrawl.dev/integrations): Integrate your tools with Firecrawl for web data access.
- [Crawl Delay Explanation](https://www.firecrawl.dev/glossary/web-crawling-apis/what-is-crawl-delay): Understanding crawl delay and its varying interpretations by crawlers.
- [Fireplexity AI Engine](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/introducing-fireplexity-open-source-answer-engine): Open source Fireplexity enables custom AI search experiences.
- [Crawl Webhooks Overview](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/launch-week-i-day-7-webhooks): Explore Firecrawl’s new webhook features for web data integration.
- [Website Contradictions Agent](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/contradiction-agent): Learn to build an agent for identifying website contradictions.
- [E-Commerce Intelligence App](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/building-ecommerce-intelligence-app-with-glm-4-6): Build an E-Commerce Intelligence app using GLM-4.6 model.
- [Spark Models Overview](https://www.firecrawl.dev/playground/0d37e2ae-b02f-4234-8fcf-4c2d792ea7e6): Discover Spark models for seamless web data extraction
- [Email Confirmation Page](https://www.firecrawl.dev/signin/confirm-email): Confirm your email to complete sign-in process.
- [Web Data Extraction Calculator](https://www.firecrawl.dev/extract-calculator): Estimate credits required for web data extraction tasks.
- [Multi-Agent Systems Tutorial](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/crewai-multi-agent-systems-tutorial): Learn to build advanced multi-agent systems with CrewAI.
- [Batch Web Scraping](https://www.firecrawl.dev/glossary/web-scraping-apis/what-is-batch-web-scraping): Batch web scraping accelerates data extraction via parallel requests.
- [Map Endpoint Introduction](https://www.firecrawl.dev/blog/launch-week-i-day-3-introducing-map-endpoint): Discover Firecrawl's new Map Endpoint for web scraping.
